title: Explore

properties.name: description
properties.value: Explore is an emote unlocked after completing 600 beginner clue scrolls. Performing this emote consists of leaning forward, searching in exploration, and then taking out a sextant to navigate instead.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Explore
Explore
Released 29 January 2020 (Update)
Members No
Enhancer No
Duration 4.8 seconds
Requirements Completion of 600 beginner clue scrolls
Animation

Explore is an emote unlocked after completing 600 beginner clue scrolls. Performing this emote consists of leaning forward, searching in exploration, and then taking out a sextant to navigate instead.

As of 17 March 2022, there are 1,728 current members that have unlocked the Explore emote.

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Reward casket (beginner)N/A 1Always
